actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Energy Conservation Act of 1973 to permit the Governor of any State to exempt that State from the provisions of the act for any reason.

summary.text: Permits, under the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Energy Conservation Act of 1973, the Governor of any State to exempt that State from the provisions of that Act for any reason.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Daylight Saving Time Energy Conservation Act of 1973 to permit the Governor of any State to exempt that State from the provisions of the act for any reason.
